yesterday I received this item. Too early to rate this, However on first look and Testing it:

1) Good looking
2) Build quality seems to be good as it seems the wires are concealed in silica which may prevent the wires from damage (but have to wait and see over time)
3) Sound quality is good.
4) Comes with clip to pin the wires with shirt and a good cloth pouch
5) Definitely worth for money (489Rs.)

Just Go for it blindly. Best you can get in this price segment. Even better than Realme Buds 2. Yeah, Realme has a better build quality but, this thing sounds betters. In addition, has a one year warranty and IPX4 Rating. Some people say that hooks cause pain in ear, but trust me they fir so well and makes it even more comfortable. I use it 6-7hours continuosly and causes no pain. I have been using a gaming headphone from 2 years. Ofcourse I feel lower stereo than the headphones but the bass ...

Box Packaging was decent and build quality at this price point is very good. Balance sound and actually i like it because most of the time i listen to old songs. Bass is good not that great but yeah it's ok for me. By the way i am not a bass lover. This headphone really justifies the price. Trust me it's a very good headphone. You r going to love it.

yesterday I received this item. Too early to rate this, However on first look and Testing it:

1) Good looking
2) Build quality seems to be good as it seems the wires are concealed in silica which may prevent the wires from damage (but have to wait and see over time)

Just Go for it blindly. Best you can get in this price segment. Even better than Realme Buds 2. Yeah, Realme has a better build quality but, this thing sounds betters. Box Packaging was decent and build quality at this price point is very good. Balance sound and actually i like it because most of the time i listen to old songs. So with a brief, 5 minute introduction, even a newbie will be ready for a game. Albeit it takes some time to master and figure out the techniques.

It's fun even with only two people playing. This game can go on for hours. It all depends on how long you want to keep score.

There are so many ways to throw wrenches into this game, and that is what makes it interesting. One minute you can be down to one card, - hence the name of the game - and the next be caught with tons of cards and have to give all those points away. All because someone changed the color, or threw down an action card.

One of the best ways to have fun on off days, or with the intent to relax. Playing UNO does not take a lot of (mental) effort, unlike the more traditional Card games. The best thing about it is that the rules are flexible (depending on who plays it and where) because of the concept of house rules. So with a brief, 5 minute introduction, even a newbie will be ready for a game. Albeit it takes some time to master and figure out the techniques.

The best thing about it is that the rules are flexible (depending on who plays it and where) because of the concept of house rules. So with a brief, 5 minute introduction, even a newbie will be ready for a game. Albeit it takes some time to master and figure out the techniques.

One of the best ways to have fun on off days, or with the intent to relax. Playing UNO does not take a lot of (mental) effort, unlike the more traditional Card games. The best thing about it is that the rules are flexible (depending on who plays it and where) because of the concept of house rules. So with a brief, 5 minute introduction, even a newbie will be ready for a game. Albeit it takes some time to master and figure out the techniques.

One minute you can be down to one card, - hence the name of the game - and the next be caught with tons of cards and have to give all those points away. All because someone changed the color, or threw down an action card.
